Option.Name: BURST ASSAULT RIFLE / ASSAULT RIFLE / HEAVY MACHINE GUN
NEEDLE GUN / BURST HANDGUN / BOMB LAUNCHER / STUN GUN
SPLIT MISSILE LAUNCHER / PULSE MISSILE LAUNCHER
LASER HANDGUN / CORAL RIFLE / LASER RIFLE / MULTI ENERGY RIFLE

variationId.Wiki: Used to link weapon with BehaviorParam, and from there projectiles/attacks. Corresponds with variationId in BehaviorParam.

sortId.Wiki: Sort ID (-1: Do not collect) (7 digits is the limit in s32 to add the enhancement level in the program)

wanderingEquipId.Wiki: Replacement equipment ID for wandering ghosts.

spEffectBehaviorId0.Wiki: Register when adding special effects to weapons

spEffectBehaviorId1.Wiki: Register when adding special effects to weapons

spEffectBehaviorId2.Wiki: Register when adding special effects to weapons

materialSetId.Wiki: Material parameter ID required for weapon enhancement

originEquipWep0.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID

originEquipWep1.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID1

originEquipWep2.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID2

originEquipWep3.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID3

originEquipWep4.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID 4

originEquipWep5.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID 5

originEquipWep6.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID 6

originEquipWep7.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID 7

originEquipWep8.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID8

originEquipWep9.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID 9

originEquipWep10.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID 10

originEquipWep11.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID 11

originEquipWep12.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID 12

originEquipWep13.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID 13

originEquipWep14.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID14

originEquipWep15.Wiki: This weapon's enhancement source weapon ID 15

weakB_DamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier for special attack B

weakC_DamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier for special attack C

weakD_DamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier for special attack D

vagrantBonusEneDropItemLotId.AltName: Vagrant Bonus Enemy: Item Lot ID

vagrantItemEneDropItemLotId.AltName: Vagrant Item Enemy: Item Lot ID

attackThrowEscape.Wiki: Basic value of throw-through attack power

parryDamageLife.Wiki: Limit the life of parry damage. It does not last longer than it is set in TimeAct.

guardAngle.Wiki: Defense occurrence range angle when guarding weapons

poiseDurability.Wiki: Additional SA durability used during attack motion

staminaGuardDef.Wiki: Defense against enemy stamina attacks when guarding successfully

trophySGradeId.Wiki: Is it related to the trophy system?

bowDistRate.Wiki: Up% to extend the flight distance

atkMaterial.Wiki: Attack material used from attack param

defMaterial.Wiki: Defense material used from attack para 1

correctType_Kinetic.Wiki: Correcting attack power by primary parameters Determines the type of graph

wepmotionOneHandId.Wiki: Basic motion ID when equipped with one hand.

wepmotionBothHandId.Wiki: Basic motion ID when equipped with both hands.

attackBaseParry.Wiki: Basic value to defeat the enemy's parry

defenseBaseParry.Wiki: Used to judge whether to be a parry or a guard at the time of parry judgment

guardBaseRepel.Wiki: Used to determine if it will pop when guarding an enemy attack

attackBaseRepel.Wiki: Guard Used to determine whether or not to be repelled when attacking an enemy

guardCutCancelRate.Wiki: Magnification that invalidates the opponent's guard cut. -100 is completely invalid. Double the defense effect of the opponent at 100.

guardLevel.Wiki: When guarding, which guard motion will the enemy attack? Decide

slashGuardCutRate.Wiki: Looking at the attack type, what percentage of the damage of the slashing attribute is cut? Specify

blowGuardCutRate.Wiki: Looking at the attack type, what percentage of the damage of the hit attribute is cut? Specify

thrustGuardCutRate.Wiki: Looking at the attack type, what percentage of the damage of the piercing attribute is cut? Specify

guardResist_AcsAnomaly.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power to poison (set to the special effect parameter)

guardResist_ElecDischarge.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power (set as a special effect parameter)

guardResist_Plasma.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power (set as a special effect parameter)

guardResist_ElecDischargeType2.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power (set as a special effect parameter)

enableGuard.Wiki: Guard with L1 when equipped with left hand

enableParry.Wiki: Parry with L2 when equipped with left hand

isNormalAttackType.Wiki: Attack type for menu display. Is it normal?

isBlowAttackType.Wiki: Attack type for menu display. Is it a blow?

isSlashAttackType.Wiki: Attack type for menu display. Is it a slash?

isThrustAttackType.Wiki: Attack type for menu display. Is it a piercing?

isEnhance.Wiki: Can it be strengthened with pine fat?

isLuckCorrect.Wiki: Is there an attack power correction by human nature?

isCustom.Wiki: Listed in the enhancement target list at the enhancement shop (may be deleted due to specification changes?)

simpleModelForDlc.Wiki: Is there a simple model for DLC?

isVersusGhostWep.Wiki: NPC Para's spirit body will now hit the opponent of . Also, the attack para Is it a ghost attack? Will be able to guard the attack of .

baseChangeCategory.Wiki: Weapon career change category. Used to display the attribute icon.

isDragonSlayer.Wiki: Is it a dragon hunting weapon?

isDeposit.Wiki: Can you leave it in the warehouse?

isDiscard.Wiki: Can you throw away the item? TRUE = thrown away

isDrop.Wiki: Can I put the item on the spot? TRUE = can be placed

showLogCondType.Wiki: Whether to display in the item acquisition log when acquiring the item (not entered: )

enableThrow.Wiki: Whether it is a throwable weapon

showDialogCondType.Wiki: Whether to display it in the item acquisition dialog when acquiring an item (not entered: new only)

disableGemAttr.Wiki: Is it prohibited to change the magic stone attribute?

defSfxMaterial1.Wiki: Defensive SFX material used from attack para 1

traceDmyIdHead0.AltName: Trace SFX ID [0] - Dummy Poly ID - Head
traceDmyIdHead0.Wiki: Sword flash root Damipoli ID_0 (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdTail0.AltName: Trace SFX ID [0] - Dummy Poly ID - Tail
traceDmyIdTail0.Wiki: Sword Flash Sword Tip Damipoli ID_0

traceDmyIdHead1.Wiki: Sword Flash Root Damipoli ID_1 (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdTail1.Wiki: Sword Flash Sword Tip Damipoli ID_1

traceDmyIdHead2.Wiki: Sword Flash Root Damipoli ID_2 (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdTail2.AltName: Trace SFX ID [2] - Dummy Poly ID - Tail
traceDmyIdTail2.Wiki: Sword Flash Sword Tip Damipoli ID_2

traceDmyIdHead3.AltName: Trace SFX ID [3] - Dummy Poly ID - Head
traceDmyIdHead3.Wiki: Sword flash root Damipoli ID_3 (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdTail3.AltName: Trace SFX ID [3] - Dummy Poly ID - Tail
traceDmyIdTail3.Wiki: Sword Flash Sword Tip Damipoli ID_3

traceDmyIdHead4.AltName: Trace SFX ID [4] - Dummy Poly ID - Head
traceDmyIdHead4.Wiki: Sword flash root Damipoli ID_4 (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdTail4.AltName: Trace SFX ID [4] - Dummy Poly ID - Tail
traceDmyIdTail4.Wiki: Sword Flash Sword Tip Damipoli ID_4

traceDmyIdHead5.AltName: Trace SFX ID [5] - Dummy Poly ID - Head
traceDmyIdHead5.Wiki: Sword Flash Root Damipoli ID_5 (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdTail5.AltName: Trace SFX ID [5] - Dummy Poly ID - Tail
traceDmyIdTail5.Wiki: Sword Flash Sword Tip Damipoli ID_5

traceDmyIdHead6.AltName: Trace SFX ID [6] - Dummy Poly ID - Head
traceDmyIdHead6.Wiki: Sword Flash Root Damipoli ID_6 (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdTail6.AltName: Trace SFX ID [6] - Dummy Poly ID - Tail
traceDmyIdTail6.Wiki: Sword Flash Sword Tip Damipoli ID_6

traceDmyIdHead7.AltName: Trace SFX ID [7] - Dummy Poly ID - Head
traceDmyIdHead7.Wiki: Sword Flash Root Damipoli ID_7 (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdTail7.AltName: Trace SFX ID [7] - Dummy Poly ID - Tail
traceDmyIdTail7.Wiki: Sword Flash Sword Tip Damipoli ID_7

defSfxMaterial2.Wiki: Defensive SFX material used from attack para 2

defSeMaterial2.Wiki: Defense SE material used from attack para 2

absorpParamId.Wiki: Weapon adsorption position parameter Id. This value determines the position where the weapon is attracted (-1: Refer to the value written directly in the old source code).

toughnessCorrectRate.Wiki: It is a magnification that corrects the basic value of toughness.

isValidTough_ProtSADmg.AltName: Is Toughness Perfomed if Poise is Initial Value
isValidTough_ProtSADmg.Wiki: Whether the toughness calculation is performed even if the armor SA is the initial value. Check the toughness specification .xlsx for details

isDualBlade.Wiki: Is this weapon a twin sword?

isAutoEquip.Wiki: Only valid for arrows and bolts. Whether to automatically equip this weapon if the target equipment slot is empty when picking up this weapon

isEnableEmergencyStep.Wiki: Is it an emergency avoidable weapon? Pass it to the behavior script.

correctType_Magic.Wiki: Determining the type of attack power correction graph with primary parameters

correctType_Fire.Wiki: Determine the type of attack power correction graph with primary parameters

correctType_Thunder.Wiki: Determine the type of attack power correction graph with primary parameters

weakE_DamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier for special attack E

weakF_DamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier for special attack F

darkGuardCutRate.Wiki: How much to cut the dark attack?

attackBaseDark.Wiki: Basic value of darkness attack that damages the enemy's HP

correctType_Dark.Wiki: Determine the type of darkness attack power correction graph with primary parameters

correctType_Poison.Wiki: Determining the type of poison attack power correction graph with primary parameters

sortGroupIdOld.Wiki: Sort item type ID. In the sort Item type order, the same ID is displayed together as the same group.

guardResist_Uranium.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power (set to the special effect parameter) to cool down

autoReplenishType.Wiki: Controls whether or not to automatically replenish and default settings

arrowBoltEquipId.Wiki: Equipment number of the quiver (magazine) display model. In the case of a bow, it is displayed as a quiver, and in the case of a crossbow, it is displayed as a magazine.

DerivationLevelType.Wiki: Type of how to set the enhancement level when returning or deriving a weapon

wepType.Wiki: Weapon type. Used for linking text and magic stones (* It is now used for other than text)

isBackSwapWeapon.Wiki: If true, this weapon will swap to hands from back instead of firing from back.

vsPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Physics.Wiki: Only attacks on the player will correct the damage done.

vsPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: Only attacks on the player will correct the damage done.

vsPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: Only attacks on the player will correct the damage done.

vsPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Thunder.Wiki: Only attacks on the player will correct the damage done.

vsPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: Only attacks on the player will correct the damage done.

vsPlayerDmgCorrectRate_AcsAnomaly.Wiki: Only attacks on the player will correct the damage done.

vsPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Plasma.Wiki: Only attacks on the player will correct the damage done.

vsPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Uranium.Wiki: Only attacks on the player will correct the damage done.

attainmentWepStatusStr.Wiki: To change the R2 attack into a special action when the status is X or higher when using a specific weapon.

attainmentWepStatusDex.Wiki: To change the R2 attack into a special action when the status is X or higher when using a specific weapon.

attainmentWepStatusMag.Wiki: To change the R2 attack into a special action when the status is X or higher when using a specific weapon.

attainmentWepStatusFai.Wiki: This is to change the R2 attack into a special action when the status is X or higher when using a specific weapon.

attainmentWepStatusLuc.Wiki: This is to change the R2 attack into a special action when the status is X or higher when using a specific weapon.

attackElementCorrectId.Wiki: ID of the parameter that corrects the attack attribute

residentSfx_1_IsVisibleForHang.Wiki: If Do you want to display when resident SFX1 is delivered? Is true, hide the SFX set to resident SFX ID1 when the weapon is delivered.

residentSfx_2_IsVisibleForHang.Wiki: If Do you want to display when resident SFX2 is delivered? Is true, hide the SFX set to resident SFX ID2 when the weapon is delivered.

residentSfx_3_IsVisibleForHang.Wiki: If Do you want to display when resident SFX3 is delivered? Is true, hide the SFX set to resident SFX ID3 when the weapon is delivered.

residentSfx_4_IsVisibleForHang.Wiki: If Do you want to display when resident SFX4 is delivered? Is true, hide the SFX set to resident SFX ID 4 when the weapon is delivered.

isSoulParamIdChange_model0.Wiki: Whether the vfx parameter Soul Param ID for Weapon Enchantment and Invisible Weapon for Weapon Enchantment settings are applied

isSoulParamIdChange_model1.Wiki: Whether the vfx parameter Soul Param ID for Weapon Enchantment and Invisible Weapon for Weapon Enchantment settings are applied

isSoulParamIdChange_model2.Wiki: Whether the vfx parameter Soul Param ID for Weapon Enchantment and Invisible Weapon for Weapon Enchantment settings are applied

isSoulParamIdChange_model3.Wiki: Whether the vfx parameter Soul Param ID for Weapon Enchantment and Invisible Weapon for Weapon Enchantment settings are applied

magazineRounds.Wiki: Number of rounds loaded per magazine.

totalRounds.Wiki: Total number of rounds that can be fired.

homingRequiredDist.Wiki: Maximum distance to target when firing for homing to function.

sortGroupId.Wiki: Sort item type ID. In the sort Item type order, the same ID is displayed together as the same group.

ammunitionCost.Wiki: Cost per round fired. At the end of each mission, the total number of rounds fired is used to calculate ammunition expenses.

shieldGuardFacingAngleHorizontalOffset.Wiki: Horizontal offset for shield guard facing angle.\nPositive values = angle right, negative values = angle left.

shieldGuardFacingAngleVerticalOffset.Wiki: Vertical offset for shield guard facing angle.\nPositive values = angle up, negative values = angle down.

shieldGuardAngleHorizontal.Wiki: Horizontal guard angle of shields. Value displayed in UI as Deployment Range (times 2).

reloadTime.Wiki: Time from start to completion of reload.

chargeTime_Level1.Wiki: Amount of time (in seconds) it takes to fully charge to level 1.

isMeleeSpecialization.Wiki: Damage benefits from Melee Specialization modifiers.

isEnergyFirearmSpecialization.Wiki: Damage benefits from Energy Firearm Specialization modifiers.

chargeTime_Level2.Wiki: Amount of time (in seconds) it takes to fully charge to level 2, for when weapon permits charging past level 1.

corporationTextureId.Wiki: Determines which corporation icon is used for the weapon.

initialGuardDuration.Wiki: Duration of the Initial Guard damage mitigation window.

initialGuardImpactDampening.Wiki: Ability to mitigate ACS strain whileperforming an Initial Guard.

chargingEnergyLoad.Wiki: Additional energy load to apply when firing a charged shot.

shoulderShootDelay.Wiki: Affects the delay before a shoulder weapon fires.

shoulderChargedShootDelay.Wiki: Affects the delay before a shoulder weapon charge fires.

coreExpansionDecayRate.Wiki: How much expansion HP is lost per second.

impactDampeningRate.Wiki: Ability to mitigate incoming ACS burden while performing a regular guard.

initialGuardDamageMitigation_Kinetic.Wiki: Ability to mitigate incoming Kinetic damage while performing an Initial Guard.

initialGuardDamageMitigation_Energy.Wiki: Ability to mitigate incoming Energy damage while performing an Initial Guard.

initialGuardDamageMitigation_Explosive.Wiki: Ability to mitigate incoming Explosive damage while performing an Initial Guard.

initialGuardDamageMitigation_Coral.Wiki: Ability to mitigate incoming Coral damage while performing an Initial Guard.

initialGuardStatusMitigation_AcsAnomaly.AltName: Initial Guard - Status Mitigation: ACS Anomaly
initialGuardStatusMitigation_AcsAnomaly.Wiki: Ability to mitigate incoming ACS Anomaly strain while performing an Initial Guard.

initialGuardStatusMitigation_ElecDischar.AltName: Initial Guard - Status Mitigation: Electric Discharge
initialGuardStatusMitigation_ElecDischar.Wiki: Ability to mitigate incoming Electric Discharge strain while performing an Initial Guard.

initialGuardStatusMitigation_CameraDisru.AltName: Initial Guard - Status Mitigation: Camera Disruption
initialGuardStatusMitigation_CameraDisru.Wiki: Ability to mitigate incoming Camera Disruption strain while performing an Initial Guard.

initialGuardStatusMitigation_Unknown.Wiki: Ability to mitigate incoming Unknown strain while performing an Initial Guard.

weaponCoolingRate.Wiki: Speed at which heat buildup is reduced.

weaponOverheatedCoolingRate.Wiki: Speed at which heat buildup is reduced if the weapon overheated.

weaponCoolingDelay.Wiki: Delay before heat buildup start reducing.

weaponOverheatedCoolingDelay.Wiki: Inherits fields from referenced weapon if the weapon overheated.

demonstrationVideoBinkId.Wiki: Refers to the video filename in Game/movie/

pulseArmorRadius.Wiki: Size of effective pulse armor (see pulseArmorVisualRadius for visual radius).

pulseArmorVisualRadius.Wiki: Size of pulse armor visuals (see pulseArmorRadius for effective radius).

menuShootCount.Wiki: Determines the number of rounds shot per attack in the weapon . Purely visual, the actual count has to be changed within the weapon's Bullets.

menuChargeStateCategory.AltName: Assembly Menu: Display Charged State Category
menuChargeStateCategory.Wiki: Whether to show base charge or full charge values in menu. Value 100 for regular weapons, 110 for two stage weapons. Unknown if this value is derived or just an enum.

menuChargeTimeType.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Full Charge Time
menuChargeTimeType.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports its Full Charge Time in the menu for weapons with multiple charge stages. No gameplay effect.

menuSecondaryChargedBlastRadius.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Secondary Charged Blast Radius
menuSecondaryChargedBlastRadius.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports Charged Blast Radius from secondary bullets, such as on-impact explosions. No gameplay effect.

menuSecondaryAttackPower.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Secondary Attack Power
menuSecondaryAttackPower.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports Attack Power from secondary bullets, such as on-impact explosions. No gameplay effect.

menuSecondaryDamageField.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Secondary Damage Field
menuSecondaryDamageField.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports multiple ticks of damage from its secondary bullets, such as plasma AoE fields. No gameplay effect.

menuSecondaryDirectHitAdjustment.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Secondary Direct Hit Adjustment
menuSecondaryDirectHitAdjustment.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports Direct Hit Adjustment from its secondary bullets, such as plasma AoE fields. No gameplay effect.

menuSecondaryImpact.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports Impact from its secondary bullets, such as plasma AoE fields. No gameplay effect.

menuSecondaryAccumulativeImpact.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Secondary Accumulative Impact
menuSecondaryAccumulativeImpact.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports Accumulative Impact from its secondary bullets, such as plasma AoE fields. No gameplay effect.

menuSecondaryBlastRadius.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Secondary Blast Radius
menuSecondaryBlastRadius.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports Blast Radius from its secondary bullets, such as on-impact explosions. No gameplay effect.

menuMeleeWeaponConsecutiveHits.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Melee Consecutive Hits

unkSecondaryDamageField.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Unk Secondary Damage Field
unkSecondaryDamageField.Wiki: Appears to relate to the same information as menuSecondaryDamageField. Why two fields do this is unknown but both seem required.

menuSecondaryChargedAttackPower.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Secondary Charged Attack Power
menuSecondaryChargedAttackPower.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports Charged Attack Power from secondary bullets, such as a laser shotgun explosion. No gameplay effect.

menuSecondaryChargedDamageField.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Secondary Charged Damage Field
menuSecondaryChargedDamageField.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports multiple ticks of damage from its secondary charged bullets, such as plasma AoE fields. No gameplay effect.

unkSecondaryChargedDamageField.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Unk Secondary Charged Damage Field
unkSecondaryChargedDamageField.Wiki: Appears to relate to the same information as menuSecondaryChargedDamageField. Why two fields do this is unknown but both seem required.

menuSecondaryChargedImpact.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Secondary Charged Impact
menuSecondaryChargedImpact.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports Charged Impact from secondary bullets, such as on-impact explosions. No gameplay effect.

menuSecondaryChargedAccumulativeImpact.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Secondary Charged Accumulative Impact
menuSecondaryChargedAccumulativeImpact.Wiki: Determines if a weapon reports Charged Accumulative Impact from secondary bullets, such as on-impact explosions. No gameplay effect.

menuBurstFire.Wiki: Determines if a weapon's standard fire reports its burst fire count to the menu, causing its displayed Attack Power, Impact, and Accumulative Impact to display said burst fire count. No gameplay effect.

menuChargedBurstFire.AltName: Assembly Menu: Show Charged Burst Fire
menuChargedBurstFire.Wiki: Determines if a weapon's charge fire reports its burst fire to the menu, causing its displayed Chg Attack Power, Chg Impact, and Chg Accum Impact to display said burst fire count. No gameplay effect.

weaponMotionCategory.Wiki: Refers to the TAE used by this weapon.
